Armed officers descend in numbers following reports of a gun on the motorway, and a have-a-go hero helps to tackle a runaway drug driver.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: New series. Emma Willis ushers in another diverse group of fame-seeking individuals who have been chosen to spend their summer invading the nation's living rooms. This year, the theme is `the United Kingdom of Big Brother - and everyone is welcome'. The housemates have been chosen from a range of backgrounds for what Channel 5 is describing as the ultimate social experiment - presumably to coincide with the headline events occurring this week in the real world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.sub-title: Big Brother: Full House with Rylan.
programme.desc: New series. Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, getting the audience's thoughts on the new housemates and the United Kingdom of Big Brother theme.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.sub-title: Big Brother: Live from the House.
programme.desc: New series. Coverage from the compound as the new housemates get to know one another and start to come to terms with being under constant surveillance as they are subjected to the first of many twists, turns and tasks from the ever-watchful Big Brother.(n)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle UK
programme.sub-title: Lip Sync Battle UK: Jimmy Carr vs Alexander Armstrong.
programme.desc: Melanie Brown and Professor Green present the musical game show as comedy actor and presenter Alexander Armstrong and comedy compere Jimmy Carr go head to head lip-synching to hit songs. Their first choice of song is performed in civvies, but for their second the celebs must bring it all to the floor - with wigs, costumes and backing dancers.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the crime thriller based on characters from the Batman comics. New detective James Gordon is eager to prove himself and is partnered with brash police veteran Harvey Bullock, with the pair stumbling upon Gotham City's highest profile case - the murder of billionaires Thomas and Martha Wayne. Gordon meets the sole survivor at the scene of the crime - the Waynes' 12-year-old son, Bruce. Moved by his loss, the rookie detective vows to catch the killer. While navigating the shady world of Gotham's criminal justice system, Gordon crosses paths with gang boss Fish Mooney, mob kingpin Carmine Falcone, and characters who will become iconic comic-book villains, including a teenage Selina Kyle (Catwoman), pending Penguin Oswald Cobblepot, and the future Riddler, Edward Nygma. With Ben McKenzie, Donal Logue, Sean Pertwee and David Mazouz.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: Internet-sourced videos, featuring gym-goers struggling with exercises, a grandmother who has found the webcam, and an odd cow. Plus, the Stars of the Week.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice helps a widower sell his 200-year-old cottage so he can pack up and start a new life in Scotland. The property is basically sound, but has an air of bachelor neglect made worse by the owner's pet Labrador, which acts like it owns the place.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Dr Paul Binski investigates places of worship designed by Christopher Wren after the Great Fire of London in 1666. Assigned to rebuild 51 of the city's churches, he created a trademark open, auditorium-style feel to emphasise the shift from Catholic to Anglican dominance.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Bull cannot believe it when all his tasty dandelions disappear and are replaced by funny fluffy things that get blown about in the wind, so Lily comes to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: The plant disappears underground, so Mofy and Mogu decide to find out what is going on.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Dr Elephant gives George and Peppa a dental check-up.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster decides she wants to be famous so she can have a statue made in her honour.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway and Alex take a rowing boat to look at a narwhal in the bay, but a storm takes them out to sea.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team install a satellite dish at Spring City News HQ, but Leo starts to make mistakes after being distracted by a game on his phone.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The firefighter comes to the rescue once again when Trevor's bus nearly runs off the edge of a cliff.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Henry tries to be helpful - but allows a herd of pigs to get dirty.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Seta steals a special wishing star after it appears in the night sky over Zahramay Falls. Shimmer and Shine try to get it back before the sorceress makes a wish.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces.
programme.desc: Big Ears cannot complete his jigsaw puzzle because some of the pieces are missing, so Noddy sets out to find out who has taken them and why.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the pups use their inflatable toy dolphin to lure the newest member of Adventure Bay's dolphin family back into the ocean when it accidentally swims into shallow water.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo try to cheer up their friend Gaston by tidying his cave, not realising he likes it the way it is.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Digby tells his friends that they need to go to Peek Rock to see a special event, Grizel and Mungo decide that they have to get there first.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig makes a special box for Peppa to keep secret things in.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet and her family fly a kite in the park.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: The little girl asks Stripes the tiger to restore order among the playful monkeys.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: The duo play a game with a dragonfly, but when it flies over the pond, they are unable to follow it.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: New series. Emma Willis ushers in another diverse group of fame-seeking individuals who have been chosen to spend their summer invading the nation's living rooms. This year, the theme is `the United Kingdom of Big Brother - and everyone is welcome'. The housemates have been chosen from a range of backgrounds for what Channel 5 is describing as the ultimate social experiment - presumably to coincide with the headline events occurring this week in the real world.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ash and Kat collect Luc from VJ, but Patrick seems uncomfortable with the baby around, while Buddy the dog swallows the drugs that Zannis had given to Brody to sell.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Paige and Jack are grateful for Lauren's help in their time of need, Xanthe searches for answers, while a degree of awkwardness lingers between Aaron and David.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Chameleon's planted clues lead the team on a wild goose chase as it searches for NSA agent Mike Atley, who the criminal claims to have in his custody. Callen is faced with a difficult decision when he is told to release the Chameleon in order to save Atley's life, and contemplates subduing his nemesis once and for all. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Framed for Murder: A Fixer Upper Mystery
programme.desc: Premiere. Small-town restoration company boss Shannon Hughes is called into help renovate a 19th-century home, only for a neighbouring resident to wind up dead. Suspecting foul play, Shannon teams up with a handsome client to turn amateur sleuth, making use of her expertise in period property to get to the bottom of the crime. Light-hearted mystery, starring Jewel Kilcher and Colin Ferguson.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Paige and Jack are grateful for Lauren's help in their time of need, Xanthe searches for answers, while a degree of awkwardness lingers between Aaron and David.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Ash and Kat collect Luc from VJ, but Patrick seems uncomfortable with the baby around, while Buddy the dog swallows the drugs that Zannis had given to Brody to sell.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: A party election broadcast by the Conservative Party for the general election on Thursday.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: The Italian Grand Prix. Action from the sixth round of the season at the Mugello Circuit, where Jorge Lorenzo was victorious last year. Lorenzo is already well down the standings following a poor start to the campaign, with fellow Spaniard Maverick Vinales at the top of the leaderboard after five races.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter Wright tries to save the life of a cow whose uterus prolapsed while calving. Elsewhere, Julian Norton goes head-to-head with a 300kg boar named Donald, who does not want to part with his dangerous tusks. Back at the practice, some of the team have an unenviable task when 13 ferrets are brought in.(n)

programme.title: Our Dream Hotel
programme.desc: New series. Alex Polizzi comes to the aid of hoteliers who are just starting out in the hospitality industry. Her first port of call is an imposing Victorian mansion in the Orkneys which has been bought by the Hodgson family from Brighton, who hope to have completed renovations in time for the tourist season - but are having to do a lot of the work themselves, despite lacking experience.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights from launch night as a new group of hopefuls entered the house and started to get to know each other better. This season Big Brother has brought together an eclectic group of individuals to represent modern Britain - so whether they get on or clash is anyone's guess.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal and his guests discuss how the Big Brother housemates are getting on after their first day in front of the cameras.(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: A macho cop goes undercover as a schoolteacher as part of his efforts to prosecute an elusive drug dealer, but quickly finds out he's no match for a roomful of feisty 6-year-olds(n)

programme.title: Love and a Bullet
programme.desc: Singer Anthony "Treach" Criss of the band Naughty by Nature stars in this urban action-crime thriller as Malik "The Ghost" Bishop, a former street gang member turned top assassin. Assigned by his boss to stake out and kill the man's innocent girlfriend (Kent Masters King), Malik falls for his target, forcing him to reflect on his violent past, which began in his childhood when he witnessed the murder-suicide of his parents. He's led to make the fateful choice of turning on his superiors instead of carrying out the slaying, a decision that results in a brutal showdown. Love and a Bullet co-stars Bud Sabatino, Freez Luv, and Walter Jones. The film inspired an animated web series entitled "The Contract."(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: In Gary Winick's romantic comedy, Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway star as best friends competing to nab the same location for their wedding reception. When Liv and Emma were girls they attended such an impressive wedding at New York's landmark Plaza Hotel that they swore that, when the time came, they would each celebrate their nuptials there. Twenty years later, after saying 'yes' to their respective fiancés, they've instructed their wedding planner to book the ceremony of their dreams. But because of a clerical error they're both given the same slot - and neither is willing to concede. Instead, their friendship is jettisoned as they resort to underhand tactics in a bid to sabotage each other and fulfil their marriage fantasies... Also starring Candice Bergen, Chris Pratt and Bryan Greenberg(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A party-centric fraternity causes all sorts of havoc and hijinks on a college campus in the early 1960s, leading to their expulsion and a grand act of revenge(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Satirical action drama set in the aftermath of the Gulf War. Four soldiers, finding a map indicating the location of secret bunkers inside the Iraqi border, go AWOL and head for the bunkers to get the gold looted from Kuwait which they believe to be hidden inside. However, they find a population being terrorised by Saddam Hussein's forces and desperate for help, and soon realise some things are more important than riches(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Rockstar Games' double-gunned action franchise comes to the big screen thanks to director John Moore (The Omen) and Mark Wahlberg, who embodies the title character of Max Payne, a widowed cop hell-bent on delivering justice no matter what the cost as he investigates a string of killings in his city. Mila Kunis and Chris O'Donnell head up the supporting cast, with Beau Thorne adapting the screenplay for the 20th Century Fox production(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: A cornet player at a legendary 1920s-era Harlem nightspot gets caught in the orbit of a notorious gangster and his teenaged mistress(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: Naomi Watts shines in this thriller about a reporter who investigates her niece's mysterious death, which seems to be linked to a videotape. Apparently, anyone who watches the tape dies horribly seven days later. Martin Henderson, David Dorfman, Brian Cox, Jane Alexander, Lindsay Frost, Amber Tamblyn(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: William Peter Blatty's Oscar-winning adaptation of his bestseller about a child possessed by a demon(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: This intense and unnerving thriller should make viewers' skin crawl. Ashley Judd stars as an Oklahoma waitress who's battling her own addictive demons. She takes on a whole new set of problems when she gets involved with an unhinged Gulf War vet (Michael Shannon) who's wracked with paranoid delusions involving invasive insects and clandestine military experiments. Directed by William Friedkin and written by Tracy Letts, who adapted his stage play. Harry Connick Jr., Lynn Collins(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965, and the soldiers who were involved, are depicted in this drama(n)

programme.title: Embarazados
programme.desc: In this comedy, a seemingly perfect couple's relationship is tested when they undergo fertility treatment(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Robert Aldrich's classic drama stars James Stewart as Frank Towns, pilot of a plane transporting workers and cargo from an oil field back to town. Caught in a sandstorm, the plane crashes hundreds of miles off course, the radio destroyed. As the days go by, all hope of rescue fades until Heinrich Dorfmann announces he is an aeroplane designer and, by cannibalising the wrecked plane, he can build a craft to fly them to safety. The outstanding cast also includes Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch, Ernest Borgnine, Ian Bannen and Ronald Fraser(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: LA journalist Steve Lopez begins writing a column about a mentally ill homeless man with a talent for playing the cello. Lopez tries to help improve his life, but finds his new friend's state of mind a stumbling block. Drama(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: True story of the colourful life and mysterious death of legendary television actor Bob Crane, star of Hogan's Heroes(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Buckle up for a wild ride as Paul Walker ("Joy Ride") and Vin Diesel ("Pitch Black") put the pedal to the metal in this high-octane action thriller. Diesel plays the leader of a gang of L.A. street racers who moonlight in highway robbery; Walker is the undercover cop who befriends him. Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Rick Yune, Chad Lindberg(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: In September 2004, comedian Dave Chappelle took a break from his immensely successful Comedy Central show to stage a free, unpublicized, all-star hip-hop concert in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Inviting fans over the Internet, on the street, and even in his family's hometown of Yellow Springs, OH, Chappelle asked filmmaker Michel Gondry to document the event from its inception on through to the performances themselves. The result is Dave Chappelle's Block Party, a concert film that provides not only a sampling of the music on display that September, but also an intimate look at the comedian himself. Gondry's cameras tag along with Chappelle as he visits Ohio, recruits a university marching band to play at the show, and surveys the opinions of Clinton Hill on the show that's about to take place. Along the way, we're introduced to some the comedian's favorite acts, in rehearsals and on-stage: Dead Prez, Jill Scott, Mos Def, the Roots, Erykah Badu, Kanye West, and the surprise reuniting of the Fugees(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: SNL alumni Tina Fey and Amy Poehler co-star in this Universal Studios comedy about two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, who decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry. Written by Paula Pell and directed by Jason Moore(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this hilarious comedy. Mitch (Luke Wilson) returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi (Juliette Lewis), involved in a ménage à trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitch's old college buddies, Beanie (Vince Vaughn) and Frank (Will Ferrell). Starring Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn, Luke Wilson & Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: A macho cop goes undercover as a schoolteacher as part of his efforts to prosecute an elusive drug dealer, but quickly finds out he's no match for a roomful of feisty 6-year-olds(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: City Sushi. When Butters gets caught up in an Asian turf war his parents discover he has multiple personalities and decide medication is the only answer - but what is Butters' therapist hiding?(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Britney's New Look. The boys meet Britney Spears while she's on a search for seclusion in the Colorado mountains, and Stan and Kyle eventually take on the responsibility of getting her to the North Pole(n)

programme.desc: Slave Fight. Sketches include the guys having a bad Skype connection; a "Django Unchained" fight; and a baseball player who likes to congratulate his teammates a bit too much(n)

programme.desc: Non-Stop Party. Sketches include a man who goes to extremes while chasing his girlfriend; and a nonstop party for the electro-pop duo LMFAO(n)

programme.desc: The Job Interview. Sketches include Judge Jessie's new show; a man prepares for a job interview; the valets discuss Val Kilmer; and a woman introduces her fiance to her parents(n)

programme.desc: Shark is known for its incredible carpet cleaning. Now, with the addition of a soft brushroll, you can do even more, such as cleaning stuck-on, small & large particles. Also offers anti-allergen complete seal technology & advanced swivel steering(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Crime Family. The Mob is demystified in the A&E program American Justice: Crime Family. Host Bill Kurtis takes the viewer into the heart of the New York underworld to examine the long arms of the Genovese family. Started when Vito Genovese worked under Lucky Luciano, the notorious family has a firm grip on syndicated crime. A&E presents rare footage of the gangster clan and its shady leaders. For years, police have pursued the Genovese, but they remain frustratingly immune to arrest. Hear from the prosecutors who have made their capture a full-time job and the historians who will explain why the Genovese will never die(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story
programme.desc: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story. Youth, seduction, and violence populate the landscape of the A&E program American Justice: Crimes of Passion -- The Pamela Smart Story. As an attractive motivated schoolteacher, Pam Smart was carving out a successful middle-class life. But, inwardly, she was passionately dissatisfied. Her husband held her back, yet she couldn't afford to live alone. Then, Smart met teenager Bill Flynn. He fell for her and she seemed flattered by the attention. Eventually, their relationship became intimate and Smart found the answer to all her problems. Through manipulation and claims of abuse, she convinced her young lover to kill her husband and that's just what he did with the help of two friends. But, Smart's calculating manner gave her away when police suspected her of being less than grief-stricken. What followed was the first live broadcast trial in history. The media explosion surrounding the case was unparalleled. Smart turned out to be a lot less organized than she thought. When her killers caved and word got around of her arranged hit, she was doomed. A&E takes the viewer back to the original trial of the century(n)

They hit it off, but when it becomes apparent he has been buying her expensive gifts, his friends suspect she is only interested in his wealth.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's old adversary Wil Wheaton returns and invites everyone to a house-warming party. Leonard is eager to go, but Sheldon threatens to shun him if he attends. However, he soon changes his mind when he finds out that Star Trek: The Next Generation actor Brent Spiner will also be there.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: While Barney prepares to get married to a mystery bride, he and Ted reminisce about Punchy's wedding, and Robin considers telling Barney she has feelings for him. Comedy, starring Neil Patrick Harris and Josh Radnor.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall worries his past indiscretions will cost him his dream job, and Ted is unsure about who to bring to the Architects' Ball. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess and Nick convince the others to come along on a cruise they booked when they were still an item. However, the trip is far from the relaxing break they intended - as Coach struggles to deal with his fear of boats, Schmidt tries to win Cece back, and Winston tries to get Jess and Nick back together. Sitcom, starring Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess introduces a `no romance' rule among the staff at school - only to find herself attracted to the hot new science teacher. Nick becomes Schmidt and Winston's secretary.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.sub-title: And the Kitty Kitty Spank Spank.
programme.desc: The girls try to find a home for a stray cat, but Max decides to take it in. However, Caroline is concerned about them looking after another pet and tries to persuade one of their colleagues to care for it. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max and Caroline take jobs as baristas to figure out how to use the new cappuccino-maker Oleg purchased for the cupcake shop. Meanwhile, Sophie and Oleg continue to miss each other but are both reluctant to share their true feelings. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny continue testing their rekindled relationship using an innovative system to report discrepancies. Howard and Bernadette begin to worry when Raj starts treating his new phone like a person, while Sheldon and Amy try to achieve internet fame by creating a video podcast about flags.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After a sleepless night, Leonard breaks his room-mate agreement with Sheldon. Howard makes preparations to go on a flight to the International Space Station and enlists Raj's help to ensure he gets a cool astronaut nickname.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Maxine panics about a recent accusation even though Adam reassures Maxine that no one is going to believe that she has hit Toby. Elsewhere, Harry makes a dangerous decision, and Scott hassles Nancy for help with the summer fete but pushes her too far.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre is reunited with his old friends when he goes to Compton for a funeral. Comedy, starring Anthony Anderson and Tracee Ellis Ross.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon panics when Leonard announces he has to go into hospital for surgery, and the impending divorce of Raj's parents motivates Howard and Bernadette to work on their own marriage. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon bids an emotional goodbye to Fun with Flags as he and Amy record the final instalment of the internet show. Leonard, Howard and Raj clear out the office of a recently deceased professor and take a peek at his research. Guest starring LeVar Burton.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane's countdown of internet clips includes a sleepover in a popular furniture shop, a mint-based rocket to the face, and a rarely seen BMX stunt.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he commits to two projects - one with Leonard and Howard, the other with Amy - on the same day. Bernadette prepares to return to work.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Bernadette find it upsetting to leave their daughter at the nursery, while the gang's university pal Bert the geologist introduces them to his attractive new girlfriend.(n)

programme.desc: Following the wildlife that inhabits the famous American national park, a lost world of deep forests, vast plains and bubbling geysers. programme.desc: In a future, android-dependent world, a robot is implicated in a murder, despite this being seemingly impossible according to the laws of robotics(n)

programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Widescreen Science-fiction adventure in which scientists discover a time portal which connects with a distant world. Left by the Egyptians, the Stargate is re-activated in the 20th-century and Colonel Jack O'Neil (Kurt Russell) and Egyptologist Dr Daniel Jackson (James Spader) are picked to head a crack team of explorers who venture through the gate to whatever lies beyond(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is back as the Transporter, who'll take anything anywhere, no questions asked, for the right money. This time, he's earning what should be easy money guarding the son of government drugs czar Billings. But when the boy is kidnapped by drugs lord Gianni, Martin takes it as a professional slur and sets out to find the boy and the baddies in Louis Leterrier's all-action film, co-written by Luc Besson(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Four years later, Brody now finds himself in a race against time when a new killer shark attacks ten boats manned by teenagers, which include his own sons(n)

programme.desc: A survivalist teams up with a military man to slay fire-breathing dragons in postapocalyptic 2020(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A band of criminals are assembled for a jewel heist by a kingpin who keeps them anonymous from each other. But when the job goes wrong, the group is left bloodied and panicked, wondering who among them is the rat(n)

programme.title: Kickboxer III: The Art of War
programme.desc: Star Sasha Mitchell returns for the second Kickboxer sequel, playing a kick-boxing champion who rescues a kidnapped girl from the Rio de Janeiro mob(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Michael Cera and Kat Dennings add charismatic spark to this enjoyable romantic comedy. They play the title characters, a heartsick musician and a young indie-rock fan who asks him to be her boyfriend in an attempt to put off an annoying classmate. What starts out as just a ploy turns into a most memorable and eventful night on the town. Ari Graynor is a blast as Norah's drunken party-hearty pal who winds up getting lost. Alexis Dziena, Aaron Yoo, Jay Baruchel. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: This delightful crowd-pleaser for all ages stars the enchanting Amy Adams as a positively perky princess who is dispatched from her fairy-tale realm by an evil queen (Susan Sarandon) and resurfaces in modern-day Manhattan. She meets a divorced lawyer (Patrick Dempsey) who takes her in while she awaits the arrival of her Prince Charming (James Marsden). Narrated by Julie Andrews. Three of the film's tunes were nominated for the Best Song Oscar. Idina Menzel, Timothy Spall, Rachel Covey(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Mike Myers and Dana Carvey star as Wayne Campbell and Garth Agar, lifelong friends who present their own cult cable show, Wayne's World, from a basement. Such is their success, slimy TV executive Ben Oliver plans to buy their show and turn it into a product-placement special. And to complicate matters, both Wayne and Oliver have fallen for foxy singer Cassandra. Based on characters first seen on Saturday Night Live, Myers' script and Penelope Spheeris's direction created an unlikely comedy, in which the nerds inherited the earth and a host of catchphrases were born. Excellent(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Frenetic holiday fare about an absentminded father who frantically tries to find a popular toy on Christmas Eve. Sinbad. The cast features former "SNL" regulars Phil Hartman, James Belushi and Laraine Newman(n)

programme.title: The Black Stallion
programme.desc: A boy and a wild horse survive a shipwreck and make it to an uninhabited island together, where they develop a bond so tight before being rescued, that the lad refuses to go without the animal. Mickey Rooney was nominated for Best Supporting Actor as an ex-jockey turned trainer(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Ex-Playboy Bunny Shelley Darlingson causes campus chaos when she joins a sorority of geeky girls and helps them turn their love lives around(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Not Exactly How We Planned. Cable drama about New York City nightclub owner James "Ghost" St. Patrick, who doubles as a drug kingpin to an elite clientele, begins with an attack on his illegal business, one that could put a crimp in his legitimate enterprise(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Whoever He Is. Ghost and Tommy take action against those responsible for the attack on their drug organization, while Ghost's wife deals with her new career and Ghost rekindles a former relationship with an attorney who's been after one of his people(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Howard the Duck
programme.desc: Director and co-screenwriter Willard Huyck has taken Steve Garber's abrasive, beer-drinking and cigar-smoking comic-book character and castrated him, turning him into a wide-eyed cutesy-pie available for the toy shelves. Huyck's Howard the Duck is a being from outer space, blown into Cleveland by an errant laser beam. After a few minutes on Earth, Howard runs into rock singer Beverly Switzler (Lea Thompson), and they become fast friends after Howard protects her from a couple of nasty punkers. The film then degenerates into an extended chase, as Howard and Beverly are pursued by government agents who want to capture Howard before he can be beamed back into space(n)

programme.title: Cat Run
programme.desc: This intense action comedy follows wannabe chef Anthony and unrepentant womanizer Julian as they team up to start a detective agency, and they get in over their heads while protecting a top-dollar escort with evidence of a conspiracy. Now, the mob, a crooked senator and an unusual assassin are all hot on their trail(n)

programme.title: John Ford Goes to War
programme.desc: This program salutes the legendary filmmaker who, during World War II, ran the Field Photographic Branch, a unit that shot a raft of documentaries that captured "the scope and sprawl of World War II." Kris Kristofferson is the narrator. Included are comments by Hollywood directors Oliver Stone and Peter Bogdanovich; and critics Leonard Maltin, Andrew Sarris and Richard Schickel(n)

The crew consists of the inventor of the gravity drive which powered the ship, called the Event Horizon, and a team of intrepid scientists. programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: A sky-diver dies in perplexing circumstances in Mexico, prompting the local mayor to ask Adrian to investigate - but he finds it difficult to concentrate on the case. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco and Lisbon reluctantly team up to investigate the kidnapping of a woman from a wealthy family. They suspect her abductors could have been behind a previous case in which a man was murdered, prompting Jane to take an unorthodox approach to save the victim's life before the ransom is paid. Crime drama, starring Terry Kinney, Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team are shocked to discover serial killer Red John targeted the CBI headquarters while they were out on assignment, leaving two agents dead and seriously wounding Bosco. Jane soon uncovers a link to another case, which leads him to vital evidence in the investigation - and the discovery that the criminal had an accomplice in the office. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The con-artists try to trick a bad-tempered hedge fund manager into believing he has killed Parker, as part of an elaborate scheme to get him to reveal critical information about Damian Moreau. Crime drama, starring Beth Riesgraf.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The con-artists take part in a festive-themed job, aiming to restore Father Chrismas's reputation by breaking into a mall and posing as St Nicholas himself. Eliot is forced to don the iconic red suit, while Hardison and Parker stand by as his assistants. However, the plot thickens when the team uncovers a nefarious scheme cooked up by an old rival. Guest starring Dave Foley and Wil Wheaton.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander last seen in the company of a mysterious blonde woman, who turns out to be missing NCIS agent and Tony's ex-lover EJ Barrett. She identifies the murderer as Seal-turned-assassin Marcellus Dane, who is suspected of working for Casey Stratton - a member of black ops unit Phantom Eight. Guest starring Sarah Jane Morris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane suspects an inside job when the team is called to a robbery at a jewellery store. After CCTV evidence confirms the involvement of a notorious safe-cracker, the agents discover he owed money to a professional criminal - but just when they think the case is closed, the business owner is taken hostage. Elsewhere, Van Pelt and Rigsby consider the future of their relationship. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The murder of a trainer at a baseball academy leads Cho, Lisbon and Jane to suspect the crime could have been motivated by money. The team learns his wife is sole beneficiary of a substantial life insurance payout, and his business partner stood to take the controlling share of their company - but a lack of evidence hampers the investigation - until the consultant follows a hunch. Jane also has a flashback when he is knocked out, leading him to remember working at a circus with his father. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team infiltrates a Department of Defence research lab in an effort to stop to Damien Moreau killing a brilliant engineer and auctioning off her work to international terrorists. Guest starring Goran Visnjic and Elisabetta Canalis.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Moreau flees from America, and when Nate and the team give chase, they discover he has taken refuge in San Lorenzo, a former British colony now ruled by a tyrannical president. Discovering their enemy has insinuated himself into the country's government, they are forced to find a new way to bring him to justice.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes into his favourite diner for a cup of coffee and finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun, forcing him to question choices he has made in the past and present. The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage).(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: Poseidon continues to work against Michael and the gang, leading to a climactic showdown, one that has fatal consequences. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle reluctantly joins forces with a mysterious stranger to bring the possession crisis in Rome to an end. Meanwhile, Megan struggles to escape her captors. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter helps Joe to publish a book, but things get out of hand when he starts to take on the writing as well. Elsewhere, Brian begins an extreme exercise regime after experiencing a runner's high for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and Lois go into business together, opening a cookie store. However, tensions rise when Peter devises his own way of attracting more customers. Adult animation, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part one of two. Stan makes a complete mess of arranging a party for his boss - who responds by sending him to Saudi Arabia, where he and the family get an unwelcome taste of life overseas. American and Arabian social customs soon prove incompatible, and a gender war looms. With the voice of Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part two of two. Stan begins to enjoy the power of living in a patriarchal culture, but the rest of the family members find it harder to become accustomed to Saudi Arabian life. Francine in particular struggles to adjust, and lands herself in trouble by staging a musical protest about gender roles.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter, Quagmire and Joe try to save The Drunken Clam when the bar's owner dies. Meanwhile, Meg gets an unusual after-school job - at a funeral home.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: After seeing a news report on rising crime in Quahog, the Griffins return home to find they have been robbed. Peter announces they are selling their house and moving to a farm in the countryside, but when they begin to struggle financially, he starts an illicit drug business.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan forgets his wedding anniversary and in desperation arranges to have 20 hours erased from Francine's memory at the CIA headquarters. However, the procedure goes awry and the hours are turned into years - so she reverts to her wild-child days and moves into her old apartment with Hayley.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The family thinks Roger has died and throws him out with the rubbish, but he wakes up at the dump and tries to make his way home. Unfortunately he is involved in a case of mistaken identity en route and ends up being taken on a pensioners' tour of the White House.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter faces a backlash over a misogynistic comic strip so the Griffins flee Quahog, and find themselves in Springfield, home to the Simpsons. However, when their car is stolen they become stuck in the town.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve turns up at a baseball game wearing a Star Trek costume - much to the embarrassment of Stan, who refuses to be seen with him. However, a dental disaster forces a change of heart, and the pair team up to catch a terrorist at a sci-fi convention. Guest starring Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan reveals his real father is actually a super-suave spy and quits his job with the CIA to join him on an important mission. Francine is none too pleased with her husband's change of role and realises things are not quite what they seem when FBI agents show up looking for an international jewel thief.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Ball Game.
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of a wealthy executive quickly reveals that the victim may not have been the assassin's intended target. Adrian is led to a baseball game as he gradually pieces the puzzle together. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane suspects an inside job when the team is called to a robbery at a jewellery store. After CCTV evidence confirms the involvement of a notorious safe-cracker, the agents discover he owed money to a professional criminal - but just when they think the case is closed, the business owner is taken hostage. Elsewhere, Van Pelt and Rigsby consider the future of their relationship. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The murder of a trainer at a baseball academy leads Cho, Lisbon and Jane to suspect the crime could have been motivated by money. The team learns his wife is sole beneficiary of a substantial life insurance payout, and his business partner stood to take the controlling share of their company - but a lack of evidence hampers the investigation - until the consultant follows a hunch. Jane also has a flashback when he is knocked out, leading him to remember working at a circus with his father. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team infiltrates a Department of Defence research lab in an effort to stop to Damien Moreau killing a brilliant engineer and auctioning off her work to international terrorists. Guest starring Goran Visnjic and Elisabetta Canalis.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Moreau flees from America, and when Nate and the team give chase, they discover he has taken refuge in San Lorenzo, a former British colony now ruled by a tyrannical president. programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A couple are murdered on their way to a high-school reunion, prompting Patrick to investigate the untrustworthy characters at the event. He connects the incident to a past case of bullying, and when he notices that Rigsby bears a resemblance to one of the victims, he tries to lure the killer out with an audacious scheme. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Tim Kang.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The corpse of a media-relations officer is unearthed at the opening of a new development in Salter, Central Valley. Mayor Melba Shannon blames eco-terrorists for the murder, but the officers later uncover evidence suggesting she herself could be to blame. When Patrick Jane is kidnapped he puts his life in danger by revealing he knows the true identity of the gang's leader. Elsewhere, a reporter films a documentary about Lisbon's unit at CBI HQ. Guest starring Sharon Lawrence (NYPD Blue).(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate and the team race to the top of a mountain, where they hope to recover lost evidence crucial to their mission to take down a corrupt financier. However, their expedition is threatened by a gang of hired guns and dangerous weather conditions. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: A mark is killed in the middle of one of the team's stings, leaving Nate in the frame for murder. With their colleague's freedom at stake, the con artists are forced to locate the real killer and complete their mission. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine Sergeant is found dead in a national park, forcing Gibbs and his team to collaborate with Mounted Police Sergeant May Dawson to solve a string of related crimes.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Three Men and a Comic Book
programme.desc: Three Men and a Comic Book. Comic books may come and go, but every red-blooded boy in Springfield loves "Radioactive Man," and Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is no exception. When Bart discovers the local comics shop, The Android's Dungeon, has a copy of the very rare first issue of "Radioactive Man," he's desperate to have it. Unfortunately, the comic is going for $100, and Bart only has $35 in his savings. Bart tries asking his parents for the money, looking under couch cushions, and (gasp!) even doing odd jobs for elderly Mrs. Glick (voice of Cloris Leachman), but he's still far short of the asking price, so Bart pools his finances with Milhouse (voice of Cartwright) and Martin (voice of Russi Taylor) and they buy the comic together. However, the three boys soon argue over who will get to keep the book, leading to an ugly scene in Bart's tree house. Daniel Stern also joins the voice cast in a brief parody of his narration of the TV series The Wonder Years. "Three Men and a Comic Book" first aired on May 9, 1991(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart's Friend Falls in Love. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is used to spending much of his time with his best friend Milhouse (voice of Pamela Hayden), but that begins to change when a new girl moves to town, Samantha Stanky (voice of Kimmy Robertson). Samantha is in the same class as Bart and Milhouse, and it doesn't take long for Milhouse to develop a serious crush on her -- and for Samantha to make clear she's also fond of Milhouse. Bart, who still appears to be stuck in the "girls are yucky" stage, doesn't understand Milhouse's infatuation with Samantha, and when he discovers he's not only brought a girl to their tree house, but is kissing her as well, Bart decides its time to break up this romance before it can spread. Meanwhile, Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) orders a subliminal weight-loss tape in hopes of getting her hubby, Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta), to drop a few pounds. But Homer receives a "Increase Your Vocabulary" instead, and while he continues to gain weight, when he speaks, he suddenly sounds like a walking thesaurus. "Bart's Friend Falls in Love" first aired on May 7, 1992(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Streetcar Named Marge. Looking for something to break the monotony of her life as a housewife, Marge Simpson (voice of Julie Kavner) auditions for the Springfield Community Center's upcoming production of Streetcar! -- a musical adaptation of A Streetcar Named Desire. The director, melodramatic Llewllyn Sinclair (voice of Jon Lovitz), isn't impressed at first by Marge's audition, but after hearing her talk to Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta), he's convinced she's just the woman to play Blanche DuBois opposite Ned Flanders (voice of Harry Shearer), who was cast because he looks better with his shirt off than anyone else who tried out. Homer doesn't think much of Marge's new interest in theater, and her anger at her husband gives her performance a keen emotional edge, but will this rift in their marriage prove irreparable? Meanwhile, since Marge is busy with rehearsals, she sends baby Maggie to a daycare center, the Ayn Rand School for Tots, where the staff is determined to keep the children away from their pacifiers; Maggie, however, isn't about to give it up without a fight. A Streetcar Named Marge first aired on October 1, 1992(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Radioactive Man. Hollywood moguls and comic book fans everywhere are abuzz over the news that Radioactive Man is to be adapted into a major motion picture, and observers are surprised by two bits of news concerning the project -- Teutonic action star Rainier Wolfcastle (voice of Harry Shearer) has been cast in the title role, and the producers have chosen to shoot the entire film on location in Springfield. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright), an ardent Radioactive Man fan, hears there will be an open call to find a young actor to play youthful sidekick "Fallout Boy," and considers himself a cinch to win the role. However, the part instead goes to Bart's close friend Milhouse (voice of Pamela Hayden), who isn't even certain he wants it. Milhouse's dissatisfaction with his new stardom grows, and one day he disappears; Bart sets out to find him and convince him not to pass up the chance of a lifetime. Meanwhile, Mayor Quimby (voice of Dan Castellaneta) busies himself by creating a wide variety of new taxes to levy against the film's production team. "Radioactive Man" also features a cameo by Mickey Rooney, who plays himself trying to convince Milhouse to finish the film; the episode first aired on September 24, 1995(n)

Leslie helps a local swim team get more practice time by working on a new law that extends the hours at the community pool; Ron finds himself filling a pothole for a local woman (Lucy Lawless) as part of Chris' new plan to solve citizens' problems around the city; April and Ben take a road trip to Pawnee(n)

programme.desc: Sex Education. Leslie responds to an STD outbreak among Pawnee seniors by conducting her own sex-education class. At the same time, Tom finds himself gadget-less and turning to Ron for help coping with life without technology and Ben and April have their first encounter with Congressman Murray(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Academy Award(r)-nominee Mark Wahlberg stars as a security guard and former alcohol smuggler who is tempted back into the illicit business by his brother-in-law after encountering financial troubles. The thriller also stars Kate Beckinsale, Ben Foster, Diego Luna, and Giovani Ribisis, and is directed by Icelandic filmmaker Baltasar Kormakur, re-imagining his original film in this high-octane remake(n)

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Liam Neeson reunites with Unknown director Jaume Collet-Serra) for this airborne thriller about an Air Marshal racing to stop the villain who has framed him as a hijacker during a non-stop flight from New York to London. From the moment we first meet Air Marshal Bill Marks (Neeson), it's apparent his nerves are frayed. After furtively knocking back a stiff drink in the airport parking lot, he enters the crowded terminal to board a plane bound for London. Carefully observing his fellow travelers along the way, Marks eventually ends up seated next to nervous flyer Jen (Julianne Moore), who begins to breathe easier once she's seated near a window. Later, as the plane hits cruising altitude, Marks receives a mysterious text message stating that a passenger on the flight will be killed every 20 minutes unless $150 million is deposited into a secure bank account. But the harder Marks works to identify a suspect, the deeper he implicates himself in what becomes a deadly hostage crisis unfolding at 30,000 feet over the Atlantic Ocean. When it's revealed that the account for the ransom money is in Marks' name, the FAA revokes his marshal status and the media paints him as a hijacker. As the frightened passengers begin to turn on Marks, he suspects the true culprit may not even be on the plane. And with the help of Jen and perceptive airline hostess Nancy (Michelle Dockery), he attempts to clear his name and protect the passengers by any means possible(n)

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The web-slingin' wall-crawler hits the screens once again in this follow-up to Marc Webb's 2012 reboot of the series. Andrew Garfield returns as Peter Parker, who squares off against the villainous Electro, played by Jamie Foxx. As the film opens, we find Richard (Campbell Scott) and Mary Parker (Embeth Davitz) stealing away with some crucial Oscorp files while leaving young Peter in the care of Aunt May (Sally Field) and Uncle Ben. Flash forward about a decade, and Peter (Garfield) is swinging into action as Spider-Man; having successfully thwarted the hijacking of an Oscorp truck by notorious Russian criminal Aleksei Sytsevich (Paul Giamatti), Peter ditches the costume just in time to meet up with Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone) at their high school graduation. Despite his deep love for Emma, however, Peter remains haunted by his promise to her late father not to get emotionally involved with her for fear that she could be targeted by Spider-Man's enemies. Meanwhile, young Harry Osborne (Dane DeHaan) inherits OsCorp and a deadly retrovirus from his father Norman (Chris Cooper), and brilliant but timid OsCorp scientist Max Dillon (Jamie Foxx) gets infused with a powerful dose of electricity while attempting to fix a faulty power circuit in the lab. Upon regaining consciousness, Max discovers that he has the power to harness electrical currents - the higher the voltage the more powerful he becomes. When a battle with Max in Times Square shorts out Spidey's web-shooters, Peter goes to work on developing a more reliable model of his signature weapon while Harry grows convinced that Spider-Man's blood is the key to his survival. Later, villainous OsCorp chairman Donald Menken (Colm Feore) steals the company out right out from under Harry, driving the vengeful youth to break Max -- now Electro -- out of the heavily-guarded Ravencroft Institute for a two-pronged attack on Menken and Spider-Man. The stage for that battle is set when New York City goes dark just as Peter declares his love to Gwen, plunging the wise-cracking web-slinger into a fight that could forever alter the course of his life(n)

programme.desc: A Victorian veterinary surgeon is certified insane after developing the ability to talk to his patients in their own language. Undaunted, he manages to escape from the asylum and embarks on a quest to locate a rare aquatic snail. Oscar-winning musical comedy, with Rex Harrison, Samantha Eggar, Richard Attenborough and Anthony Newley. Songs include Talk to the Animals and I've Never Seen Anything Like It.(n)

programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond.(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: Feisty heroine Annie and her new boyfriend Alex take a cruise in the Bahamas, but the trip becomes a nightmare when they discover a vengeful computer genius - a former employee laid off because of his terminal illness - is also on board. He has secretly programmed the ship to crash into an oil tanker while he steals a cache of diamonds from the cargo. Action thriller sequel, with Sandra Bullock, Jason Patric and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Premiere. He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger.(n)

A British soldier deployed to Belfast in 1971, almost immediately finds himself caught up in a riot. In the aftermath, he becomes separated from the rest of his unit. Lost and alone at night in a hostile and unfamiliar area, he makes a disturbing journey in search of safety. Thriller, starring Jack O'Connell and Richard Dormer.(n)

Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph.(n)

Drama, starring John Wayne, John Carroll, Anna Lee and Paul Kelly.(n)

programme.desc: While the family works cattle, Ree Drummond fills the freezer with components ready to turn into meals at a moment's notice.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe travel to Eden Valley in Cumbria to prepare the perfect sausage roll for the Brough Annual Agricultural Show. They also meet up with Dianne Halliday from the Country Fare Bakery, where a 12-strong team produces thousands of cakes that are sold nationally and internationally.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Aldo Zilli and Silvena Rowe conclude their culinary road trip in the village of Muker in the Yorkshire Dales, where they try to impress judge Val Punchard by being creative with two items from a Dales kitchen. During their visit they meet a couple who are renowned as one of the community's finest food producers and are hoping to impress with a whisky and ginger wine cake.(n)

programme.title: Patricia Heaton Parties
programme.desc: Patricia and friends help plan a bubbly birthday brunch for singer-songwriter, Ruby Amanfu, serving up a tropical fruit parfait, muffin tin eggs benedict and cocktails.(n)

programme.title: Patricia Heaton Parties
programme.desc: Patricia Heaton lounges poolside with her friends, actress Amy Aquino and her husband, Drew McCoy, and actor Diedrich Bader and his wife, Dulcy Rogers.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef looks for things to do with pumpkins other than turning them into traditional Halloween lanterns. Recipes include a roast duck and pumpkin winter salad with Asian dressing, a soup and a lighter snack - squash fairy cakes.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef serves up home-grown winter salad dishes, including a bagna cauda, a herb omelette, and a Japanese-style tuna sashimi with sprouting herb salad and a surprising dressing. Meanwhile, gardener Brian experiments with seeds to demonstrate the full array of colourful, tasty ingredients available in the cold, dark months.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul explores an area previously unknown to him, Norwegian baking. He meets a family who bake national treats and creates his version of two of Bergen's favourite bakes.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to prepare her own take on comforting home cooking.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond demonstrates how to prepare her own take on comforting home cooking.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Eight well-known chefs set off on a road trip to compete in some of the most demanding cookery contests around the UK, with two taking part each week. The first duo are Ed Baines and Valentine Warner, who begin by putting their roulades up for scrutiny at the Otley Show in West Yorkshire, and not only are they taking on each other, they are pitted against the best local cooks.(n)

programme.title: Country Show Cook Off
programme.desc: Ed Baines and Valentine Warner continue their culinary road trip, heading to London for the Lambeth Country Show to prepare an entry for the garden vegetable cake category. They also visit nearby Brixton Village Market, where Ning Ma and her mother Mama Lan let them in on their family recipe for prawn, egg and Chinese chive dumplings.(n)

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: The junior chefs deal with some seriously stinky ingredients for judges Marcus Samuelsson, former White House chef Sam Kass and blogger Ayesha Curry.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul visits the city of Jerusalem, spending time with traditional bakers. Inspired, he creates his own Jerusalem bagel bread, and almond and pomegranate loaf cake.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver rustles up more simple dishes using home-grown produce. He is joined by a Welsh sheep farmer who tackles common misconceptions about lamb and explains how the conditions the animals are kept in affects the quality of the meat.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares recipes using leeks, including pappardelle and a `concertina' squid dish. He also explains why the underrated vegetables can be a real asset in the kitchen and offers advice on how to grow and store them.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a Memphis-style barbecue restaurant in Horn Lake, Mississippi, to sample their ribs, cheese fritters and burgers with pork rinds.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a restaurant in Boston that serves an Italian-themed seafood dish.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Seattle chef Renee Erickson celebrates summer by smoking meats and seafood in wine barrels that have been transformed into smokers.(n)

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: At Ned Ludd, an American craft kitchen restaurant in Portland, chef Jason French loves to prepare food in his wood-fired oven so much that he doesn't even have a gas stove.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Chef Robert Irvine heads to Hillbillies Restaurant in Murphys, California, to investigate why Jami's breakfast and lunch spot is failing.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: A restaurant owner discovers that his manager brother is acting inappropriately with guests and asks the team to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Restaurant owners ask the team for help when two employees bring their personal life into the work place and begin to affect sales and disrupt morale.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers head for Wales, where they meet three women who demonstrate their most impressive dishes, preparing Maltese stuffed marrow, an elaborate cheesecake, and an orchid gateaux. The pair also enjoy biker-cooked lamb cutlets en croute with a red wine gravy, and visit a recipe fair where budding cooks gather to share the best meals on their family menus.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass.
programme.desc: Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood tackle the signature, technical and showstopper challenges from the second half of the series. Mary makes a swirling chocolate and orange tart, a Swedish princess torte and her own version of the two-tiered dobos torte, while Paul prepares mini sausage plaits and demystifies the kouign amann, which baffled the bakers in the tent.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: It's the last week of the heats and five more chefs enter the kitchen, with the first challenge giving them an hour to cook a signature dish that showcases what they can do, before one is asked to leave. The remaining four contenders try to impress Monica Galetti by preparing a cuttlefish dish in just 15 minutes, and then Marcus Wareing gives them 60 minutes to create a meal incorporating sweetbreads. The judges then decide which three will make it through to the next round.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Everyday Gourmets
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers demonstrate how to make gourmet food without breaking the bank. They begin with a few weekend treats, rustling up several delicious dishes, gleaning money-saving secrets at the UK's only pub with two Michelin stars and finding out how beer can be as good a match with food as wine. Everything they learn will be put to the test when they help a wounded soldier say thank you to some very important people with a surprise barbecue.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul
programme.desc: The chef takes a gastronomic road trip to Istanbul through the countries of the former Byzantine Empire - a melting pot of East and West. His journey begins in the city of Venice, and on the idyllic Greek island of Symi he cooks some of his favourite Venetian dishes including seafood risotto, tiramisu and gnocchi with spider crab.(n)

programme.title: Eat Well for Less
programme.desc: MasterChef judge Gregg Wallace and greengrocer Chris Bavin set out to help the Scott-Dent family in Newport with their food shopping, showing them simple and effective ways to save money. Kate and Chris have three children under 10, they both work, and Kate hates cooking, so relies on freezer food, Gregg and Chris secretly watch them on a weekly shop to see where they are going wrong, and their mistakes include buying sliced and grated cheese, pre-prepared fruit and veg, and overpriced frozen food. The couple are shocked when they are told that they are spending twice the amount of an average family of five. Plus, Chris tries to allay Kate's fear of using food near its sell-by date, and investigates how safe our food labels really are, while dietician Lucy Jones investigates the nutritional differences between margarine and butter.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass.
programme.desc: Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood tackle the signature, technical and showstopper challenges from the second half of the series. Mary makes a swirling chocolate and orange tart, a Swedish princess torte and her own version of the two-tiered dobos torte, while Paul prepares mini sausage plaits and demystifies the kouign amann, which baffled the bakers in the tent.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: It's the last week of the heats and five more chefs enter the kitchen, with the first challenge giving them an hour to cook a signature dish that showcases what they can do, before one is asked to leave. The remaining four contenders try to impress Monica Galetti by preparing a cuttlefish dish in just 15 minutes, and then Marcus Wareing gives them 60 minutes to create a meal incorporating sweetbreads. The judges then decide which three will make it through to the next round.(n)

programme.title: World's Best Restaurants
programme.desc: Documentary highlighting remarkable and exclusive eating destinations where the food is outstanding, the service impeccable and the experience memorable. Their talents are judged by chef and restaurateur Marco Pierre White.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass.
programme.desc: In their final tutorial, Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry tackle the signature, technical and showstopping challenges from the last few weeks of the competition. Mary makes lemon and raspberry eclairs and double chocolate entremets, while Paul prepares a cherry and chocolate loaf, povitica and raspberry and chocolate doughnuts.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The final first-round heat sees five more chefs enter the kitchen, with the first challenge giving them an hour to cook a plate of food that showcases their culinary skills, before one is asked to leave. The remaining four try to impress Monica Galetti by preparing three canapes, after which Marcus Wareing asks them to make a spectacular crab dish. The judges then decide which three have earned a place in the next round.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Everyday Gourmets
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers demonstrate how to create a dinner for two that is fit for a king, but doesn't cost the earth. They receive presentation tips from Michelin-starred chef Olivier Limousin and delve into Britain's rich history for cut-price culinary inspiration. Everything they learn is put to the test when they help single mother Paula say a big thank-you to her supportive parents.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul
programme.desc: The chef continues his gastronomic road trip from Venice to Istanbul taking in the countries of the former Byzantine Empire - a renowned melting pot of East and West. This instalment finds the gastronome in the city of Ravenna, where he discovers Piadinas, a thin Italian flatbread street food dating back to Roman times. He then crosses the Adriatic Sea to Croatia - a first for Rick - and a gets a chance to discover new a wealth of dishes such as pasticada, goat stew with peas and lamb peka.(n)

programme.title: Eat Well for Less
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace and Chris Bavin help the Sainis from Sutton Coldfield, who are addicted to supermarket offers and have a tendency to over-indulge on snacks and sweet treats. They buy so many crisps in a single shop that Gregg is left wondering what they actually eat for dinner. The family are vegetarian, so dietician Lucy Jones looks at the nutritional difference between beef mince and soya mince, and Gregg visits a factory to find out how meat substitute is made - but can he and Chris persuade the Sainis to change their ways?.(n)

programme.desc: Tom Cruise, in his breakthrough role, stars as Joel Goodson, a straight-A student left in charge of the house by his holidaying parents. Grabbing the Porsche, he heads downtown and picks up a glamorous hooker. She's on the run from her pimp and when she sees Joel's house, she has an idea: seduce him and persuade him to turn it into a high class bordello for just one night, so she and her friends can relieve his friends of their cash. All goes well until her pimp turns up looking for payback in Paul Brickman's sex comedy that rises above the genre to be both entertaining and provoking(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Jovovich and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them. Now, as well as facing the computer's weaponry, they must tackle the living dead to prevent the virus escaping into the outside world. Paul W Anderson's horror thriller is based on the successful computer game(n)

programme.title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: Teen comedy about a girl attending an exclusive prep school whose life takes a dramatic turn when she discovers that she is the heir to the throne of a small European nation. Her grandmother begins the daunting task of tutoring the awkward teen in royal behaviour, which is no mean feat considering the girl's lax table manners, poise and hair care(n)

programme.title: Nights in Rodanthe
programme.desc: Adapted from author Nicholas Sparks' popular romance novel, director George C. Wolfe's Nights in Rodanthe tells the tale of a doctor (Richard Gere) en route to reconcile with his estranged son when his benevolent mission is sidelined upon checking into a North Carolina beach-town inn. When the doctor arrives at the inn, he enters into a passionate affair with an unhappily married woman (Diane Lane) who is currently considering divorce(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: A janitor at MIT, Will Hunting has a gift for maths that can take him light-years beyond his blue-collar roots, but to achieve his dream he must turn his back on the neighborhood and his best friend. To complicate matters, two strangers enter the equation: a washed-up shrink who starts to coach Will through his transformation, and a med student who shows him that there can be a pretty face along with his life of the mind(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Hugely successful businesswoman Michelle Darnell (Melissa McCarthy) is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she is forced to move in with a long-suffering employee of hers (Kristen Bell), and tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. Peter Dinklage, Kristen Schaal, and Kathy Bates co-star in this comedy, which was directed by Ben Falcone (McCarthy's real-life husband), and co-written by McCarthy, Falcone, and Steve Mallory(n)
