programme.title: We Own the Night
programme.desc: By-the-book cops-and-robbers thriller about a shady Brooklyn nightclub owner (Joaquin Phoenix) who clashes with his police-chief father (Robert Duvall) and cop brother (Mark Wahlberg) in 1988. Eva Mendes, Antoni Corone, Moni Moshonov. Written and directed by James Gray(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)
Fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: Waterlogged sequel with the disaster-prone Annie Porter, this time battling a madman on a cruise ship with the help of her new boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: (2002) Martin Scorsese's multi-Oscar-nominated epic stars Daniel Day-Lewis as William Cutting, the leader of a violent gang in 19th-century New York who take on their rivals, led by "Priest" Vallon (Liam Neeson). Vallon dies and his young son Amsterdam disappears, only to return a man (Leonardo DiCaprio) torn between a thirst for revenge and a fascination for the charismatic Cutting, with Cameron Diaz as Jenny Everdeane, the pickpocket they both love(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Two New Jersey shop workers spend a day discussing sex, girls, porn and movie trivia, attending a wake and playing rooftop hockey(n)

programme.title: Mallrats
programme.desc: Bawdy U.S. comedy film about two comic-obsessed students who are dumped by their respective girlfriends and try to come to terms with their romantic loss at the local shopping mall(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jason Lee are starting to make it as a comic strip creators but their friendship is threatened when Affleck falls head-over-heels for Joey Lauren Adams, who is gay. Kevin Smith, whose Clerks showed earlier, offers an engaging, amusing love story that carries an underlying seriousness about the pains of love(n)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy in which a pair of eccentric New Jersey slackers head to Hollywood after discovering that a film is being made featuring superheroes based on their likenesses. As they head west, a series of misadventures befalls them, including close encounters with a group of glamorous jewel thieves and an orangutan(n)

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: You can take the clerks out of the Quick Stop, but you just can't take the Quick Stop out of the clerks as Dante (Brian O'Halloran) and Randall (Jeff Anderson) prove in this long-awaited sequel to Kevin Smith's breakthrough comedy. Years after we last saw them, Dante is still toiling behind the counter at a New Jersey convenience store and Randall is still annoying customers at the video shop next door -- or at least they are until a fire burns down the strip mall, forcing Dante and Randall to look for work. Times are tough, and the guys find themselves embracing the ultimate indignity as they take jobs at Mooby's, a fast-food outlet where the burgers are advertised as "udderly delicious." While Randall's snarky attitude toward the public remains unchanged, Dante is trying to make the best of the situation as he plans to marry his fiancée, Emma (Jennifer Schwalbach Smith), and move to Florida. However, Dante's plans are complicated when he falls for Becky (Rosario Dawson), a funny and tart-tongued woman who happens to be his boss at Mooby's. Lurking about in the background, as always, are Jay (Jason Mewes) and Silent Bob (Kevin Smith), who for good or ill have changed even less with the passage of time than Dante and Randall. Clerks II also features Wanda Sykes, Ethan Suplee, and Trevor Fehrman, with cameo appearances from Kevin Smith regulars Ben Affleck and Jason Lee(n)

programme.title: Edge of Winter
programme.desc: In this gripping thriller, a divorced man tries to bond with his two sons during a hunting trip in the wilderness. However, the brothers realize that they might not be able to trust their father when a snowstorm strands all of them in a deserted cabin(n)

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: A Chinese man returns from years in a labor camp during the Cultural Revolution only to find that his wife has amnesia and doesn't remember him(n)

programme.title: The Object of My Affection
programme.desc: When unmarried Jennifer Aniston becomes pregnant she has to choose either her pathetic boyfriend or gay roommate as a potential dad(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: After sleeping with her sister's boyfriend, wild child Maggie goes looking for her long-lost grandma. Can Ella help Maggie change her life and make it up to her big sister Rose? Touching comedy drama based on Jennifer Weiner's bestselling book(n)

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Writer-director Scott Frank, who scripted the screen adaptations of Elmore Leonard's "Get Shorty" and "Out of Sight," scores a winner with this gripping noirish caper saga. Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as a bank janitor who falls in with thieves who are planning to rob his workplace. When he has second thoughts about participating, they ratchet up the pressure with threats to some innocent outsiders. Jeff Daniels, Matthew Goode, Isla Fisher, Carla Gugino, Bruce McGill, Sergio Di Zio(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: When two children find a mysterious old board game and start to play it, they release a mysterious man called Alan, who's closely followed by a horde of stampedimg animals! It seeems he and a friend discovered the game 25 years earlier, and he became trapped in it. Can the two kids tame the madcap menagerie and help Alan to escape from his supernatural prison? Great computer animated effects and some excellent perfromances make this a truly magical film that's fun for all the family(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch and released in America under that title, the two leads bring the same warmth and humour to their roles as their British counterparts. Even sports fans unfamiliar with baseball will know the pain that comes from attending an important function when your team are playing a crucial match(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Carlos Saldanha's sequel to the incredibly successful original animation reunites the three unlikely friends, Manny the mammoth (voiced by Ray Romano), Sid the sloth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger as they are forced to leave the safety of the valley, which is threatened by a melting glacier. But their trek to safety is complicated as Manny discovers a mate, Ellie, Diego confronts his fear of water and Sid is crowned the sacrificial king of a secret sloth society(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: When two children find a mysterious old board game and start to play it, they release a mysterious man called Alan, who's closely followed by a horde of stampedimg animals! It seeems he and a friend discovered the game 25 years earlier, and he became trapped in it. Can the two kids tame the madcap menagerie and help Alan to escape from his supernatural prison? Great computer animated effects and some excellent perfromances make this a truly magical film that's fun for all the family(n)

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two brothers find a magical board game in the basement. They little suspect the sci-fi adventure which awaits them, in which they must dodge aliens and black holes to avoid the deep freeze of outer space(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars as Honey Daniels, a dancer and choreographer who struggles to get by until she gets her one big break, but soon she realises that it's too good to be true(n)

programme.title: Waking Life
programme.desc: From director Richard Linklater, who created the independent breakout films Slacker and Dazed and Confused, comes a digital video effort that has animated in a process called interpolated rotoscoping, brought to life by 31 animation artists who drew over live-action footage to create a dream-like state that is both real and surreal. The director works in a free-associative manner much like in Slacker and opens on a young vagabond arriving at a town by train. After a ride in an odd car-boat, he meets up with a professor who voices his deep philosophical leanings. The young man stumbles upon more figures that resemble the media, evolution, and even characters out of other Linklater features, including Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy, whose characters in Before Sunrise make an appearance, as well as director Steven Soderbergh, who relates an anecdote about Louis Malle telling Billy Wilder that his new film "is like a dream." A non-narrative piece that flows like a fever dream, Waking Life features voicework by over 70 actors, including Wiley Wiggins, Adam Goldberg, and Nicky Katt(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: Max is a genius and paranoid mathematician obsessed with finding numeric patterns. He believes there's a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature, which is the key for understanding all existence. Due to his theories representatives from a high-powered Wall Street firm and a Hasidic cabalistic sect try to pursue him. Winner of the Directing Award at Sundance Film Festival and Independent Spirit Award for Best First Screenplay(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Remake of the Steve McQueen caper film with Pierce Brosnan as a billionaire art fancier who orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud(n)

programme.title: L'Auberge Espagnole
programme.desc: In this refreshing and lively comedy, a French student moves to Barcelona to study Spanish to improve his career opportunities. He moves in with six other European roommates and gets some lessons in life and love(n)

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Alec Baldwin star in the award-winning drama depicting two days in the lives of real estate men competing in a sales contest where the losers will be fired(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Luc Besson's high-end, high-octane mystery adventure set mostly in the 23rd Century. When a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension, a New York cabbie discovers that Earth is facing an impending attack of pure evil. In a complex plot involving ancient curses, a corrupt corporate boss, all-powerful monsters, shape-changing assassins, laser battles and huge explosions, the unlikely pair set out to locate the five mystical elements that make up the only defence against worldwide destruction(n)

programme.title: Volver
programme.desc: Pedro Almodóvar's engaging (and at times surreal) profile of three generations of Spanish women dealing with life's ups and downs(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Remake of the Steve McQueen caper film with Pierce Brosnan as a billionaire art fancier who orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Housewife Cathy finds her husband kissing another man and her perfect life cracks apart at the seams. She finds consolation with her African-American gardener Raymond, which only draws more disapproval from her conservative neighbours(n)

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: A convicted arsonist schemes to get out of prison by convincing his debauched wife to seduce his retirement-ready parole officer in director John J. Curran's adaptation of a play by Angus MacLachlan (who also authored the screenplay). His career as a parole officer winding down after years of service, Jack Mabry (Robert De Niro) reluctantly accepts an assignment to reassess inmate Gerald "Stone" Creeson's (Edward Norton) case for an upcoming parole hearing. Convicted of setting a fire to make the murder of his grandparents look like an accidental death, Stone will do anything to get out from behind bars, and his wife, Lucetta (Milla Jovovich), is willing to do whatever it takes to help secure her husband's freedom -- including seducing Jack. Meanwhile, Jack's devoted wife, Madylyn (Frances Conroy), has suffered with the emotional weight of her husband's demanding job for far too long(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: Highly acclaimed drama about a junkie, Bob Hughes, and his 'crew' of fellow addicts, who drift through 1970s North America robbing hospitals and pharmacies to feed their increasingly large habits. When one of his sidekicks dies, Bob decides to go straight - but his girlfriend has problems following him into the drug-free world. The film features a memorable cameo from William S Burroughs(n)

programme.title: Spread
programme.desc: A ¿serial-womanizer¿, Nikki (Ashton Kutcher) moves from one wealthy woman to another and operates by his own set of rules. He¿s also homeless, car-less, amoral, and good-looking. His latest conquest is Samantha (Anne Heche), an attorney whose house overlooks L.A. But in Nikki's world of money, power, and fame, true stardom is fleeting, since he¿s beginning to develop actual feelings for a pretty young waitress. Little does he know that he's about to fall victim to his own seductive game(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their career lasted a bit less than two years, few rock bands have made a more dramatic impact than the Sex Pistols, who quickly rose to international infamy as the best-known British punk band, then fell apart shortly after their first American tour in a tempest of drugs, ego, and infighting. Manager Malcolm McLaren began making a film about the group while they were at the height of their fame, but by the time McLaren and director Julien Temple completed The Great Rock 'n' Roll Swindle, the group's best-known member, bassist Sid Vicious, was dead, and the remaining Pistols -- vocalist Johnny Rotten (aka John Lydon), guitarist Steve Jones, drummer Paul Cook, and original bassist Glen Matlock were in litigation against McLaren and refused to participate. In 1998, Temple began working with the group's surviving members (who reunited for a brief tour in 1996) for this definitive documentary of the Pistols' career, which combines new interviews with footage of legendary live performances (such as their infamous Jubilee Day show on a ship sailing past the Houses of Parliament), as well as newsreels of the chaos that followed in their wake, including the TV appearance that changed them overnight from a little-known cult band to national pariahs(n)

programme.title: Wind Chill
programme.desc: When two college students sharing a ride home break down on a deserted stretch of road, they're preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there(n)

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Story about a serial killer who agrees to be a bone-marrow donor for the dying son of a cop in order to escape from jail(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Los ganadores del premio Oscar Robin Williams y Cuba Gooding Jr., estelarizan en esta metafísica historia sobre la vida y lo que hay después de la muerte. Williams da vida a Chris Nielson, un hombre felizmente casado que está de luto por la muerte acciden(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Dreaming of Joseph Lees
programme.desc: In 1950s rural England, a young woman (Samantha Morton) rejects her impassioned suitor because she is still in love with her second cousin. Joseph: Rupert Graves. Harry: Lee Ross. Signora Caldoni: Miriam Margolyes. Directed by Eric Styles(n)

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love(n)

programme.title: Ten Thousand Saints
programme.desc: A punk-loving teen moves to New York City in the late '80s with his bohemian dad, and gets caught up in the local music scene. He also befriends a girl his age who's coping with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Woman
programme.desc: An actress wrestles with feelings of guilt and remorse following an affair with Charles Dickens(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: In an attempt to save the family shoe factory from financial ruin, new boss Charlie creates a line of sexy footwear that's modelled by Simon, a vivacious cross-dresser with perfect feet. British comedy from the creator of Calendar Girls(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: A self-reliant orphan in 16th-century France is disliked by her stepmother but adored by a prince in this progressive update of the classic fairy tale(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Diane Keaton is a high-flying exec with the apartment and boyfriend to match. But she finds herself left a baby in a distant relative's will and, rather than give the infant up, takes her in. Soon, Ramis has left and she's lost her job. She starts a new life in Vermont, where local vet Sam Shepherd soon takes a marked interest in her in Charles Shyer's gentle comedy, which is lifted by Keaton's superb performance. The film was so successful that a TV series starring Charlie's Angel Kate Jackson followed(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: Tootsie
programme.desc: With a terrible reputation and no job offers in sight, desperate actor Michael Dorsey assumes the identity of a woman to get a part on a soap opera(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger loses his job, his car, his apartment and his grilfriend -all in one day - he decides he has only one option: volunteer for the army. And he talks his friend Russell into enlising with him. Where else, they figure, can they help save the world for democracy....and meet girls! John and Russell find basic training a snap: they are arrested twice, have endless run-ins with their drill sergeant and get into a big mess at a female mud wrestling match. They even steal a top secret government vehicle to take some gorgeous female Mps on a date, and wind up behind the iron curtain. Stripes is outrageous fun!(n)

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: Four sets of strangers experience life, love, fortune and fame in the Italian capital. Romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A romantic comedy chronicling multiple encounters between a shy British gentleman and an uninhibited American woman, who have their first brief meeting at a wedding and then continue to run into each other at subsequent sets of nuptials and one funeral(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie, a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist and his haughty theorist wife in this winning romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: "Revenge" is the watchword of this black comedy that takes a keen look at the self-centeredness, blind ambition, cynicism, and amoral behavior in modern-day Hollywood. Buddy is the control-freak Hollywood production executive with a reputation for abusing his employees. He is particularly abusive to his young personal assistant Guy, a recent film-school graduate and naive Hollywood newcomer. The idealistic young Guy is routinely humiliated by Buddy. Unable to stand anymore abuse and no longer the naive idealist, Guy turns on Buddy. He ends up tying him up and then subjecting Buddy to all the sadism, and torture Buddy inflicted on others. He threatens to do even worse, but is deterred by an unexpected arrival, whose presence leads to a surprising final plot twist. The film was first shown at Telluride Film Festival as The Buddy Factor but was retitled for its general release in 1995(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

programme.title: Hudson Hawk
programme.desc: Michael Lehmann's critically-blasted, big-budget flop stars Bruce Willis as Eddie Hawkins, a master thief who is blackmailed into one final heist before retirement(n)

programme.title: A Smile like Yours
programme.desc: A childless couple attempting to conceive discover that his sperm are lazy. Several trips to a fertility clinic prove fruitless. Also, the wife had surreptitiously quit taking the pill and provided her doctor with a sperm sample before the husband agreed to start trying to have a baby. The deception alienates the husband for a time. To compound things, a female architect has the hots for the husband and lures him out of town on business at exactly the wrong time(n)

programme.title: Blonde Ambition
programme.desc: Endearing romantic comedy about a small-town sweetheart (a delightfully charming Jessica Simpson) who heads to New York City to catch up with her boyfriend, who is cheating on her, and stays to take a job with a big company, where she finds love with a handsome employee (Luke Wilson) and becomes a pawn in a corporate power struggle. Country-music legend Willie Nelson costars as Simpson's grandfather. Directed by Scott Marshall (son of Garry Marshall)(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan returns as Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee in John Cornell's sequel to the hit comedy original. When Mick's girlfriend Sue Charlton comes into possession of incriminating photographs concerning the drugs baron Rico, he kidnaps her. Mick must use all of his bush craft, both in America and in his native Outback, to free her and collar the baddies(n)

programme.desc: In this touching romantic comedy, a has-been screenwriter takes a teaching job at a university in Upstate New York. He soon becomes emotionally invested in the lives of his students, particularly a single mother who recently caught the writing bug(n)

programme.desc: Warmly humorous update of the Cyrano de Bergerac story, starring Steve Martin and Daryl Hannah. The grotesquely long-nosed fire chief of a small American town is in love with a beautiful astronomer - though she has eyes only for a dull but handsome visiting fireman. The chief is too ashamed of his appearance to make advances himself, but is drawn into assisting his rival from behind the scenes(n)

programme.desc: Langston Whitfield is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover the South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager, a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks, in order to put this method to the test(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: Gary Sinise stars in this mind-bending adaptation of a classic story by legendary sci-fi author Philip K. Dick. In 2079, a military scientist (Sinise) desperately tries to prove his true identity after he's accused of being a booby-trapped android from outer space. Vincent D'Onofrio, Madeleine Stowe, Tony Shalhoub(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Terry McMillan and Ron Bass wrote this screenplay based on McMillan's semi-autobiographical best-selling novel (over 2,000,000 copies in print before the release of this film). San Francisco stockbroker Stella (Angela Bassett), a 40-year-old divorcee, has a nice Marin County home and an 11-year-old son, Quincy (Michael J. Pagan). With Quincy off to see his dad, Stella and her best friend Delilah (Whoopi Goldberg) vacation in Jamaica, where she meets sexy, good-looking Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs). He's the man of her dreams in every way except one -- he's half her age. Even so, a romance develops. Grammy Award-winning songwriters Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis supervised the film's music and produced the R&B-slanted soundtrack album. Shown at the 1998 Urbanworld Film Festival (NY)(n)

programme.title: Salute
programme.desc: Profile of white Australian sprinter Peter Norman who gave a Black Power salute at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City when two black U.S. athletes were honored during a medal ceremony(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: A detective tracking a serial killer gives up all hope of sol ing the crimes and moves to another city. After he's settled in the old acquaintance he makes himself known. The serial killer has resurrected and begins sending him new pictures of new victims. One of which is the detective's psychiatrist(n)

Rocker Sheryl Crow has a small role. Janeane Garofalo, Dwight Yoakam, Eric Mabius(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: If you could choose to live forever, would you? That's the thought-provoking question posed in Natalie Babbitt's famous novel, and this film based on it. The story centres round Winnie, a girl who lives in a very strict household where there's very little love or fun to be had. Then she discovers a mysterious family living in the grounds of the house, and falls in love with one of them. Jesse returns her affection, but then divulges his family's secret: they are immortals - people who will live forever since they drank from a magical spring. If Winnie wants to be with Jesse she must become immortal too. But there are lots of disadvantages - what will she choose? Teenage romance with a message in this touching family drama(n)

programme.title: Monkeybone
programme.desc: From Henry Selick, director of Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas and James and the Giant Peach, comes this equally dark film, starring Brendan Fraser as Stu Miley, an animator who's about to hit the big time on TV with Monkeybone, his cheeky ape creation. But on his way to celebrate with his girlfriend Dr Julie McElroy, his car crashes and he descends into a coma, trapped in the nightmare world of the comatose, which is populated by his creations, including Monkeybone. If he can acquire an exit pass from Death, he can escape, but Monkeybone steals the pass, takes over his body and prepares to "party" with the unsuspecting Julie. Can Stu find his way back to reality and his own body in time in this intriguing mix of live action and animation fantasy?(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: No Time like the Past. Disillusioned with the present, Paul Driscoll (Dana Andrews) builds a time machine and heads to the past, hoping to correct mankind's mistakes. Failing spectacularly in this endeavor, he elects to take up permanent residence in the small town of Homeville, Indiana, circa 1881, where he hopes to live out his life in quiet contentment. Alas, despite his herculean efforts not to alter the course of history, that is just what he ends up doing. As originally written by Rod Serling, this hour-long Twilight Zone episode opened with a lengthy philosophical discussion between Driscoll and his mentor Dr. Harvey. This was adjudged too dull for TV consumption, thus a new opening was dreamed up wherein Driscoll was shown trying to prevent the sinking of the Lusitania and the rise of Hitler's Nazi Party. Accordingly, the role of Dr. Harvey was diminished, obliging proposed costar Joseph Schildkraut to drop out of the episode. The final version of "No Time Like the Past" premiered March 7, 1963(n)
